text: Aimé Halbeher (16 March 1936 – 3 August 2021) was a French political activist and politician. He was born in Paris, France. He was a member of the Central Committee of the French Communist Party from 1976 until 1987. Halbeher died on 3 August 2021 in Paris, aged 85.Aimé Halbeher, un grand révolutionnaire vient de disparaître ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French communists Category:Politicians from Paris
title: Aimé Halbeher
